title: Student Help \*Franklin Gothic
content:
I am currently working on a research report for my Typography 3 class at Humber College.

Does anyone know where I can get some solid information on Benton’s Franklin Gothic?

Thanks!

Sc

 [‹ Basic Alphabet teaching for children?](http://web.archive.org/web/20081024203643/http:/typophile.com/node/50692 "Go to previous forum topic") [American Script Styles? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081024203643/http:/typophile.com/node/50685 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Spencer Cathcart

comments.content:
Or even interesting facts I could toss in?

Sc
The Humber College library would be a good start. Look at Lawson’s _Anatomy of a Typeface_.
